text: She has filed for a divorce that has not yet been finalized. And on Steve Harvey's chat show this week, Brooke Burke shared her view of whether it is appropriate to date someone in her situation. Brooke, 46, said on Steve :'I'm more concerned about the emotional separation and the emotional divorce than the legal document requiring a signature - for me.'Scroll down for video Filed but not finalized : On Steve Harvey's chat show this week, Brooke Burke shared her view of whether it is appropriate to date someone in her state of divorce limbo She had said that'it really depends, because getting divorced can take a long time. People can be - have filed divorce, and it can take years. And a lot of people separate with the intention of never getting back together, but there are legal complications
